title: Mini Maya
blurb: Simple OBJ mesh editor, inspired by Maya. Uses a half-edge data structure under the hood and supports Catmull-Clark subdivision, face triangulation, edge splitting, skinning via joint skeletons, and more.

imgs.alt: A multicolored cow mesh is shown in the viewport. It was imported from an OBJ file.
Cube has been triangulated on one of its faces. A vertex, half-edge, and face are selected.
The cow has been skinned with a skeleton. The head joint is selected.
The cow is deformed at the head and right foot.
